title: Mind Power - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/1/22
itunes:title: Mind Power - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/1/22
description:
George Noory and author Anthony Hamilton discuss his research into the mind, and how to use positive energy to change the outcome of negative events, plus how creative people like Elon Musk use mental energy to create the things they visualize in their mind.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
